page.title: 03GIRL GUIDES
page.content: Guides was introduced by Lord Baden Powell.1985 is the 75th year of guiding.Guides is for girls aged between 10 and 15 and there are patrols in the company.There should be between 6_8 guides in a patrol.The patrol should have a patrol box, in which should be kept,first aid kit, patrol subs,paper,pens and pencils,books,balls,beanbags,string and lots more.A patrol leader looks after and is in charge of her patrol with a patrol seconder,together they make decisions.I go to Maylandsea Guides,we meet in the Scout and Guide H.Q on Tuesday from 7.30 to 9.00.Guide s is very good because we go canoeing, swimming and we have activities in our Guider's garden,I like going camping best.Latchingdon's guides meet at Latchingdon school from 7.30 to 9.00.I enjoy Guides very much.
